Question
========

Two students both use a chance generator to pick an integer from 1 to 7. What is then the probability that they will choose the same number from the discrete uniform distribution?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/7
* 1/3
* 1/49
* 48/49

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/7: Correct
* 1/3: Incorrect
* 1/49: Incorrect
* 48/49: Incorrect
